high_descs: turn to the left go to the right towards the black  table
pick up the newspaper from the black table
turn to right go to the right go left towards the big black couch
put the newspaper on top of the black couch
turn to the left
go to the left face the other black couch
pick up a newspaper that is on top of that couch turn to the right go right
put the newspaper next to the other one on top of the big black couch
tasks.task_desc: put 2 newspapers on top of a big black couch

high_descs: Walk over to the wooden table with the television on it.
Pick up the middle watch off of the wooden table.
Turn right and walk over to the couch, then turn left to face the small wooden table with the newspaper on it.
Put the watch on the table in front of the newspaper.
tasks.task_desc: Move a watch to a small wooden table.

high_descs: Turn left and walk to the coffee table then turn right and walk to the tv.
Pick up the watch that's in front of you under a credit card on the tv stand.
Take a step to your right to face the small end table with a newspaper on it.
Put the watch under the newspaper in the middle near the edge.
tasks.task_desc: Put a watch on a table.

high_descs: Walk ahead and slightly left to the front of the TV.
Pick up the second watch from the left.
Take two steps right.
Place the watch in front of the newspaper on the table.
tasks.task_desc: Place a watch on a table.

high_descs: Go around the coffee table in front of the left end of the couch.
Pick up the keys off the bottom left end of the coffee table.
Head around the left end of the coffee table towards the front of the love seat against the wall.
Place the keys in the middle of the love seat on top of the cushions to the left side of the box.
Turn left and go to the front of the TV.
Pick the keys up off the top of the stand to the left of the remote control.
Move back towards the front of the love seat.
Place the keys on the left side of the other keys.
tasks.task_desc: Take the keys from the coffee table and the TV stand, place on the love seat.

high_descs: Walk to the table with the television ahead.
Pick up the closest remote on the left side of the table under the television.
Turn around and walk to the small wooden table next to the chair on the left.
Put the remote control inside the cardboard box on the table.
Pick up the box with the remote control from the table.
Turn around, hang a right at the door and turn right at the television to face the ottoman.
Place the box with the remote on top of the ottoman.
tasks.task_desc: Place a box with a remote on an ottoman.

high_descs: Look down onto the TV stand.
Pick up the remote closest to you off the TV stand.
Turn around and move to the sofa to your left with the laptop on it.
Put the remote into the box on the end table.
Pick up the box with the remote in it.
Turn around and move in front of the TV, facing the coffee table.
Set the box onto the coffee table.
tasks.task_desc: Put away the spare remote onto the coffee table.

high_descs: Move over to the left side of the TV stand
Pick up the closest remote from the TV stand
Move to the far end of the couch
Put the remote into the box
Pick up the box from the table
Turn around and move over to the coffee table
Put the box on the coffee table behind the card
tasks.task_desc: Retrieve a remote control, put in box, put box on coffee table.

high_descs: Turn left and walk to the television stand on the right.
Pick up the remote control on the far right of the television stand.
Turn around and walk to the couch on the left.
Put the remote control inside the cardboard box on the middle of the couch.
Pick up the box with the remote inside from the couch.
Turn left, hang a left at the wall and walk to the side of the brown ottoman on the left.
Put the box with the remote inside on top of the ottoman.
tasks.task_desc: Place a box with a remote on an ottoman.

high_descs: Turn to the left and then right. Move forward to the TV.
Pick up the remote from the table, on the right side.
Carry the remote and turn around. Turn to the left and face the couch.
Place the remote inside the box on the couch.
Pick up the box from the couch.
Carry the box and turn around. Move a step closer to the coffee table.
Place the box on the coffee table, on the right side.
tasks.task_desc: Move a remote and box to the table.

high_descs: walk to face tv and tv stand
pick up remote from tv stand
walk to face sofa with box
put remote inside box on sofa
pick up box from sofa
turn to face coffee table
put box on coffee table
tasks.task_desc: put box and remote onto coffee table

high_descs: Turn around the room and move to the long chair on your right.
Pick up the remote on the chair.
Turn left across the room, then face the table on your left.
Place the remote on the table.
Turn to your right and face the chair.
Pick up the remote on the chair.
Turn right across the room, then face the table on your right.
Place the remote on the table.
tasks.task_desc: Place the remote on the table.

high_descs: Turn around and go to the side of the coffee table closest to the couch.
Pick up the remote control on the left side of the coffee table.
Go to the seat on the right with the newspaper on its cushion.
Put the remote control on the seat close to the back.
tasks.task_desc: Put a remote control on a seat.

high_descs: Turn right, walk around the coffee table until you are on the side with the remote.
Pick the remote up off of the coffee table.
Turn right and walk up to the leather armchair with the newspaper on the seat.
Place the remote on the seat of the armchair behind the newspaper.
tasks.task_desc: Place a remote onto the seat of an armchair.

high_descs: Go to the table behind you.
Pick up the remote from the table.
Go to the chair to the right of the table.
Place the remote on the chair and behind the newspaper.
tasks.task_desc: Place a remote on a chair.

high_descs: Turn around, go forward to the TV stand.
Take the right remote control from the TV stand.
Turn left, go forward, turn left before reaching the couch, go forward to the chair.
Put the remote control in the box on the side table to the right of the chair.
Take the box from the side table.
Turn left, go forward, turn left after passing the coffee table, go forward, turn right and go forward to the two seat couch.
Put the box on the couch.
tasks.task_desc: Put a box with a remote control in it on a couch.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the TV.
Pick up the rightmost remote on the table in front of the TV.
Turn left and walk to the box on the table between the chair and the sofa.
Place the remote in the box on the table.
Pick up the box from the table.
Turn left and walk to the sofa on the other side of the room.
Place the box on the right seat of the sofa.
tasks.task_desc: Place a box with a remote in it on the sofa with a remote on it.

high_descs: Turn around and face the television.
Pick up the remote on the right side of the table.
Carry the remote and turn around to find the brown chair.
Place the remote in the box on the right side of the chair.
Pick up the box and remote from the table.
Carry the box and turn left to go around the coffee table, then right to find the brown couch.
Place the box in the middle of the couch.
tasks.task_desc: Put a remote in the box and move them to the couch.

high_descs: Wait straight to the couch
Take the remote on the couch
Head to the left
Put the remote in the box next to the couch
Pick up the box from the table
Take a couple steps to the right
Put the box on the couch
tasks.task_desc: Put the remote in the box, put the box on the couch

high_descs: Walk straight towards the sofa
Pick up the remote on the sofa
Turn to your left, walk few steps then turn right face the side table with a box
Put the remote on the box
Pick up the box with remote on the side table
Turn to your right walk straight, then left facing the sofa
Put the box with remote on the top of the sofa
tasks.task_desc: Put the box with remote on the sofa

high_descs: Face the couch with the remote control on it.
Pick up the remote from the couch.
Turn left, walk toward the table with the statue, turn right to face the table with the box on it.
Put remote control in the box.
Pick up the box from the table.
Turn completely around and move to where you face the couch.
Put the box on the couch.
tasks.task_desc: Put a box with a remote control in it on the couch.

high_descs: Move straight back to the TV stand with the watch on top of it
Pick up the watch on the TV stand
Turn around and head to the coffee table on top of the rug
Place the watch on top of the coffee table on the front left corner
tasks.task_desc: Move a watch to the coffee table

high_descs: Turn left and move over to the entertainment center the television is sitting on.
Pick up the watch from the entertainment center.
Turn completely around to face the coffee table.
Place the watch down on the coffee table.
tasks.task_desc: Move a watch from the entertainment center to the coffee table.

high_descs: Turn around and face the television.
Pick the watch up from the television stand.
Turn around and face the coffee table.
Put the watch down on the coffee table.
tasks.task_desc: Put a watch on a coffee table.

high_descs: Turn to your right and go to the first end table to the right of the TV.
Pick up the watch on the end table.
Turn around and go to the coffee table in the center of the rug.
Place the watch on the left corner of the coffee table, closest to you.
tasks.task_desc: Put a watch on the coffee table.

high_descs: turn right, walk to the sofa, turn left to the side table
grab the watch on the table
turn around to the coffee table
put the watch on the coffee table
tasks.task_desc: move the watch from the side table to the coffee table

high_descs: Move to the right to the brown side table to the right of the TV stand
Pick up the watch on top of the brown side table
Carry the watch to the wooden coffee table facing the laptop
Place the watch on the right hand corner of the coffee table
tasks.task_desc: Carry a watch to the coffee table

high_descs: Locate the keys from the brown coffee table.
Pick up the keys from the table.
Walk along the left side of the table towards the single sofa.
Put the keys on the sofa.
Turn around and walk across the room to the TV, then turn right to go to the love seat.
Pick up the keys from the love seat.
Turn right and go back to the single sofa.
Put the keys on the single sofa next to the first keys.
tasks.task_desc: Put keys from a coffee table and a love seat respectively on a single sofa.

high_descs: Turn left then face the little table by the couch to your right.
Take the news paper off the table in front of you.
Turn around and face the center table to your left.
Place the news paper on the center table in front of you.
Go forward, then right and face the couch to your left.
Take the news paper from the couch in front of you.
Turn left, then left again and face the center table to your left.
Place the news paper on the center table in front of you.
tasks.task_desc: Place news paper on center table.

high_descs: Turn right and face the table with the news paper in front of you.
Take the news paper from the table in front of you.
Turn around and face the center table in front of you.
Place the news paper on the center table in front of you.
Turn left and face the couch in front of you.
Take the news paper from the couch in front of you.
Turn around and face the center table in front of you.
Place the news paper on the center table in front of you.
tasks.task_desc: Place news paper on the center table.

high_descs: Turn around to the left and walk to the end table between the wall and armchair.
Pick up the figurine from the end table.
Turn around to the right and walk over to the coffee table.
Place the figurine on the coffee table.
tasks.task_desc: Moving a figurine from an end table to a coffee table.

high_descs: Turn around and walk across the room and then turn right to face a sculpture.
Pick up the sculpture on the side table.
Turn around and walk halfway across the room and then turn to the living room table on the left.
Place the sculpture on the living room table.
tasks.task_desc: Move sculpture from side table to living room table.

high_descs: Move to the brown wooden side table that is to the left of the brown couch with the statue on it
Pick up the statue sitting on top of the table
Carry the statue to face the coffee table
Place the statue on top of the coffee table in front of the computer
tasks.task_desc: Move a statue from a side table to the coffee table

high_descs: Turn to the right and walk forward to the coffee table. Make a right and then go forward to the TV stand.
Pick up the TV remote furthest to the right located on the TV stand.
Turn to the left and walk to the lamp. Turn completely around and go forward to the side table.
Place the remote inside the box on the side table.
Pick up the box with the remote in it.
Turn to the left and go to the brown chair.
Place the box on the brown chair.
tasks.task_desc: Move a box with a remote inside to a chair.

high_descs: Turn around and walk straight slightly then turn right and walk up to the TV
Pick up the remote control on the right from the stand
Turn left walk forward slightly then turn left and walk up to the brown chair
Place the remote control inside the box sitting on the table next to the chair on the right
Pick up the box with the remote inside
Turn to the left slightly and then face the front of the brown chair
Place the box with the remote control inside on the brown chair seat cushion
tasks.task_desc: Move a remote control into a box and set it on the chair cushion

high_descs: Turn to the right, then the right again to face the TV.
Pick up the remote that is on the right side, in front of the TV.
Take the remote and turn to the right, then the right again to find the brown chair.
To the right of the brown chair is a box, place the remote inside.
Pick up the box from the table.
Carry the box, and look to the chair on the left side.
Place the box with remote on the chair.
tasks.task_desc: Move a box and remote to a chair.

high_descs: Turn left, walk straight, Turn left to the table with the laptop
Pick up the remote on the table
Turn right, Walk toward the TV, turn right, Walk to the brown couch
Put the remote in the box
Pick up the box on the couch
Turn right, walk straight. Turn right, Walk straight to the couch, Turn left to the small couch
Put the box on the couch
tasks.task_desc: Put a remote in a box then put the box on a couch

high_descs: Turn left, go forward a bit, turn right and go to the coffee table
Pick up the remote on the coffee table
Turn around and go to the couch
Put the remote into the box on the couch
Pick up the box on the couch
Turn right, go forward, turn right, go forward, turn left at the chair
Put the box on the chair
tasks.task_desc: Put a remote into a box, take the box to the chair

high_descs: Turn around and face the middle table with the lap top on it in front of you.
Take the remote from the middle table in front of you.
Turn around and face the box on top of the brown couch in front of you.
Place the remote in the box on top of the sofa in front of you.
Pick up the box in front of you.
Turn around and face the couch to your left.
Place the box on top of the couch in front of you.
tasks.task_desc: Place a box with a remote on a different couch.

high_descs: Move to the left to face the television on the television stand.
Pick the watch up from the television stand.
Move to the right and face the table to the right of the television stand.
Put the watch on the table on top of the credit card.
tasks.task_desc: Put a watch on a table.

high_descs: turn left then turn right towards the tv and look down
pick up the watch on the tv stand
turn right and walk straight towards the couch then turn left towards the table
put the watch down on top of the credit card on the table
tasks.task_desc: put the watch on the table from the tv

high_descs: Walk very slightly to the left then turn right towards the watch on the TV stand.
Pick up the watch on the TV stand which is to the right of the television.
Turn right and walk to the small side table to the right of the television that contains two remote controls.
Put the watch on top of the credit card on the table.
tasks.task_desc: Move a watch from a television stand to a small side table.

high_descs: Turn around and go to the coffee table.
Pick up the watch on the front, right corner of the table.
Go around the coffee table, through the couch to your right, to the end table across from you, between the couch and the chair.
Place the watch on the front, left corner of the end table.
tasks.task_desc: Put one watch on the end tale.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the coffee table, then turn left to face the other side of the room.
Pick up the closest watch from the table.
Turn right and walk to the small table in the corner between the chair and the couch.
Put the watch on the left near corner of the table.
tasks.task_desc: Put a watch on the corner table.

high_descs: Turn around, walk to table, turn left,
Pick up watch off of table
Turn right, walk to end of table
Place watch on end table beside chair
tasks.task_desc: Move the watch from table to end table

high_descs: Turn right, take a step forward, turn right and walk to the television.
Pick up the remote control sitting in the center of the television stand.
Turn left, walk to the end of the rug, turn left and walk between the sofa and coffee table to the chair on the other side.
Put the remote control in the box on top of the table next to the chair.
Pick up the box containing the remote control.
Turn completely around, walk to the end of the rug, turn right, walk to the end of the rug, turn right so you are looking at the coffee table.
Put the box containing the remote control on the top of the coffee table on the end furthest away from you.
tasks.task_desc: Put the remote in the box, and put the box on the coffee table.

high_descs: walk to face tv set
pick up remote from tv stand
walk left to face side table with box
put remote in box on side table
pick up box from side table
walk to face coffee table
put box on coffee table
tasks.task_desc: put box with remote on coffee table

high_descs: Turn around to the TV set.
Pick up the remote to the right of the statue.
Turn around to walk around the coffee table, hanging a left to reach the table in between the two couches in the corner.
Put the remote in the cardboard box on the table.
Pick up the cardboard box with the remote in it.
Turn around, walking around the coffee table to face it.
Set the cardboard box with the remote in it down on the coffee table.
tasks.task_desc: Pick up a remote and put it in an empty cardboard box to put in the coffee table.
